channel.title: KevinCTofel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KevinCTofel.

item.description: NASA's iconic Voyager 1 marks 45 years in space https://t.co/caQpCgSsXe
item.source:markdown: NASA's iconic Voyager 1 marks 45 years in space https://t.co/caQpCgSsXe

item.description: @StevenSandhoff I’ve only tested with Windows, Linux and ChromeOS. However, according to the product page, it is Mac compatible as well. https://t.co/vXOthzKSbp
item.source:markdown: @StevenSandhoff I’ve only tested with Windows, Linux and ChromeOS. However, according to the product page, it is Mac compatible as well. https://t.co/vXOthzKSbp

item.description: ChromeOS 105 is due out any day now and it will bring a new experimental feature. ChromeOS 105 adds keyboard controls for Android games. https://t.co/qLnHXVFzUa
item.source:markdown: ChromeOS 105 is due out any day now and it will bring a new experimental feature. ChromeOS 105 adds keyboard controls for Android games. https://t.co/qLnHXVFzUa

item.description: @geekinchief Oh, no doubt. When you have one company making the panels, this is what happens. It's definitely a niche, expensive purchase right now.
item.source:markdown: @geekinchief Oh, no doubt. When you have one company making the panels, this is what happens. It's definitely a niche, expensive purchase right now.

item.description: Another great E Ink monitor use case: Blogging. I added a desk lamp so no more backlight usage. Anything text-based (or mostly text-based) is ideal for this device. https://t.co/3CyRXt7GX6
item.source:markdown: Another great E Ink monitor use case: Blogging. I added a desk lamp so no more backlight usage. Anything text-based (or mostly text-based) is ideal for this device. https://t.co/3CyRXt7GX6

item.description:
“Cannon in her ruling justified her actions by claiming that Trump faces the stigma of having had his home searched, and any future indictment based on the seizure of those records would cause "reputational harm."

I’m thinking that ship has sailed. https://t.co/F0sGHkpsrb
item.source:markdown:
“Cannon in her ruling justified her actions by claiming that Trump faces the stigma of having had his home searched, and any future indictment based on the seizure of those records would cause "reputational harm."
I’m thinking that ship has sailed. https://t.co/F0sGHkpsrb

item.description: @RonKJeffries Any use case that’s primarily text based: docs, notes, reading/browsing, email, etc. It’s been plug and play on both Windows and ChromeOS so far. https://t.co/2WM2SPi3o6
item.source:markdown: @RonKJeffries Any use case that’s primarily text based: docs, notes, reading/browsing, email, etc. It’s been plug and play on both Windows and ChromeOS so far. https://t.co/2WM2SPi3o6

item.description: @djakdekiel Mechanical keyboard near the microphone makes it sound like I'm using a sledgehammer. 🤣

item.description: A 90-second look at the Boox Mira E Ink monitor, this time in VS Code with Windows. Refresh rate and lag are good enough for this use case; at least for me. https://t.co/e8XVhROb3n

item.description: Another reason I’m thrilled that I moved my site to @linode: great, simple explanation of which server application types benefit from Dedicated vs Shared CPU Instances. Super useful to an end user. https://t.co/fgUOdyzgyY via @YouTube
item.source:markdown: Another reason I’m thrilled that I moved my site to @linode: great, simple explanation of which server application types benefit from Dedicated vs Shared CPU Instances. Super useful to an end user. https://t.co/fgUOdyzgyY via @YouTube

item.description: “Did you know that Chrome provides monitorEvents and monitor so that you can get a log each time an event occurs or function is called?” https://t.co/YB3c80MPgD
item.source:markdown: “Did you know that Chrome provides monitorEvents and monitor so that you can get a log each time an event occurs or function is called?” https://t.co/YB3c80MPgD
